00034 /*! The name and column type. */
00035 typedef struct _ColumnNameType
00036 {
00037         std::string cname;              /// The column name
00038         File5_dtype_t ctype;    /// The column type
00039 } ColumnNameType;
00040 
00041 /*! Stores a display and associated group name. */
00042 typedef struct _TableOfContentsEntry
00043 {
00044         std::string displayName;        /// A name to use for user display.
00045         std::string groupName;          /// The group name
00046 } TableOfContentsEntry;
00047 
00048 /*! A utility class for handling a file with multiple data tables. */
00049 // Normally we use "m_" as a prefix for member names.
00050 class File5_MultiDataUtils
00051 {
00052 private:
00053         /*! The pointer to the file. */
00054         File5_File *file5;
00055 
00056         /*! A pointer to the data group. */
00057         File5_Tsv *tsv5;
00058 
00059         /*! The column index. */
00060         int colIdx;
00061 
00062 public:
00063         /*! The constructor. */
00064         File5_MultiDataUtils();
00065         
00066         /*! The destructor. */
00067         virtual ~File5_MultiDataUtils();
00068 
00069         /*! Open an existing, or create a new, file.
00070          * @param fileName The name of the file.
00071          */
00072         void Open(const std::string &fileName);
00073 
00074         /*! Close the file. */
00075         void Close();
00076 
00077 /////////////////////////////////////////WRITE FUNCTIONS///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00078 
00079         /*! Create a new tsv group.
00080          * @param gname The name of the group.
00081          * @param dname The display name for the group.
00082          */
00083         void CreateTsv(const std::string &gname, const std::string &dname);
00084 
00085         /*! Define a new column
00086          * @param cname The name of the column.
00087          * @param ctype The data type for the column.
00088          * @param csize The size of the column.
00089          */
00090         void DefineColumn(const std::string& cname, const File5_dtype_t ctype, int csize=-1);
00091 
00092         /*! Add an entry to the column.
00093          * @param ival The value to add.
00094          */
00095         void AddEntry(int ival);
00096 
00097         /*! Add an entry to the column.
00098          * @param fval The value to add.
00099          */
00100         void AddEntry(float fval);
00101 
00102         /*! Add an entry to the column.
00103          * @param sval The value to add.
00104          */
00105         void AddEntry(const std::string &sval);
00106 
00107         /*! Add a parameter to the open group, or file header before DefineColumn is called.
00108          * @param key The parameter key name.
00109          * @param val The parameter value.
00110          */
00111         void AddParameter(const std::string &key, const std::string &val);
00112 
00113 /////////////////////////////////////////READ FUNCTIONS///////////////////////////////////////////////////////

00116          * @param gname The name of the group.
00117          */
00118         void OpenTsv(const std::string &gname);
00119         
00120         /*! Close the tsv group. */
00121         void CloseTsv();
00122 
00123         /*! Delete a tsv group. */
00124         File5_return_t DeleteTsv(const std::string &name);

00127          * @param toc The table of contents.
00128          */
00129         void GetTOC(std::vector<TableOfContentsEntry> &toc);
00130

00132          * @param groupType The type of group.
00133          * @return The status
00134          */
00135         bool headersBegin();
00136

00138          * @param key The output header key.
00139          * @param val The output header value.
00140          * @return The status
00141          */
00142         bool headersNext(std::string* key, std::string* val);

00145          * @param cname The name of the column.
00146          * @param col The column data.
00147          */
00148         void ExtractColumn(const std::string& cname, std::list<int> &col);

00151          * @param cname The name of the column.
00152          * @param col The column data.
00153          */

00157          * @param cname The name of the column.
00158          * @param col The column data.

00160         void ExtractColumn(const std::string& cname, std::list<std::string> &col);
00161

00163          * @param cname The name of the column.
00164          * @param col The column data.
00165          */
00166         void ExtractColumnAsString(const std::string& cname, std::list<std::string> &col);
00167 
00168         /*! Extract the column names.
00169          * @param colInfo The names and data types of the columns.
00170          */
00171         void ExtractColumnNames(std::list<ColumnNameType>& colInfo);
00172 
00173         /*! The line count of the open TSV group. */
00174         int TsvLineCount();
00175 
00176         /*! Get the next lines data. Assumption is the first column is a name (string) value.
00177          * @param name The row name (first column)
00178          * @param data The remaining columns data.
00179          * @return True if success.
00180          */
00181         bool NextLine(std::string &name, std::vector<int> &data);
00182 
00183         /*! Get the next lines data. Assumption is the first column is a name (string) value.
00184          * @param name The row name (first column)
00185          * @param data The remaining columns data.
00186          * @return True if success.
00187          */
00188         bool NextLine(std::string &name, std::vector<float> &data);
00189 
00190         /*! Get the next lines data. Assumption is the first column is a name (string) value.
00191          * @param name The row name (first column)
00192          * @param data The remaining columns data.
00193          * @return True if success.
00194          */
00195         bool NextLine(std::string &name, std::vector<std::string> &data);
00196 
00197         /*! Get the next lines data as string values. Assumption is the first column is a name (string) value.
00198          * @param name The row name (first column)
00199          * @param data The remaining columns data.
00200          * @return True if success.
00201          */
00202         bool NextLineAsString(std::string &name, std::vector<std::string> &data);
